oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An account of how |kerri or Oud Dorntje and his brothers catch a leopard (translated as tiger), take it home, cook it and eat it. 1) Note on the inside of the back cover of this notebook 'Finished correcting Sept 15/71 from Jantje Toorm himself', 2) This story is found in Book II-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oud Dorntje catches a leopard ('tiger')
